Name: Silent Earth
About the game: Silent Earth is a short sci-fi text adventure about finding oneâ€™s place despite an uncertain future. Synopsys The colonists aboard Bean II struggle to find meaning after Earth stops responding to communications, putting their lifelong purpose into question. Players explore the off-world mining colony ship, navigate multi-linear character relationships, and steer the story toward one of five endings. Features Roughly half-hour playtime Space romance Dynamic soundtrack by Djinn Proxy Artwork by Raven Rusch
